slides.title: Proof Techniques
slides.content:
# Proof Techniques ðŸ“

## Direct Proof
Assume P, show Q directly.

## Contradiction
Assume Â¬Q, derive contradiction.

## Induction
1. Base case: Show P(1)
2. Inductive step: P(k)â†’P(k+1)

## Contrapositive
Prove Â¬Qâ†’Â¬P (equivalent to Pâ†’Q)
